source.sqlReaderQuery:
with ctf as(

    SELECT
        x.ctf_cod    
        ,x.ctf_tipo
        ,case
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'C' then 'Consultas'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'R' then 'Cirurgias'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'E' then 'Exames'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'T' then 'Taxas'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'D' then 'Di√°rias'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'A' then 'Terapia'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'M' then 'Materiais'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'S' then 'Materiais Especiais'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'N' then 'Medicamentos'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'G' then 'Gases'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'O' then 'Outros'
          end DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO  
    from  dbo.ctf x WITH (NOLOCK)
)

,aux_pre_fat as(

    SELECT 'A' AS CD_TIPO_PFAT , 'ABERTO' AS DS_TIPO_PFAT
        UNION ALL
    SELECT 'P' AS CD_TIPO_PFAT , 'PROCESSADO' AS DS_TIPO_PFAT
        UNION ALL
    SELECT 'X' AS CD_TIPO_PFAT , 'EM PROCESSAMENTO' AS DS_TIPO_PFAT
        UNION ALL
    SELECT 'R' AS CD_TIPO_PFAT , 'PROCESSAMENTO INTERROPIDO POR ITENS SEM RATEIO' AS DS_TIPO_PFAT
        UNION ALL                        
    SELECT 'Z' AS CD_TIPO_PFAT , 'PRE-FATURA ZERADA' AS DS_TIPO_PFAT
                       
     
)

,aux_status_fat as(
    SELECT 'A' AS CD_TIPO_FAT, 'ABERTO' AS DS_STATUS_FAT
        UNION ALL
    SELECT 'P' AS CD_TIPO_FAT, 'PENDENTE' AS DS_STATUS_FAT
        UNION ALL
    SELECT 'F' AS CD_TIPO_FAT, 'FATURADO' AS DS_STATUS_FAT
        UNION ALL
    SELECT 'C' AS CD_TIPO_FAT, 'CANCELADO' AS DS_STATUS_FAT
    

)



,prod as(
SELECT
    pac.pac_nome
    ,a.osm_pac                                                                              as cd_pessoa_fisica
    ,cast(a.osm_num as varchar(15))                                                         as nr_atendimento
    ,cast(a.osm_serie as varchar(15))                                                       as nr_interno_conta
    ,cast(a.osm_serie as varchar(5)) +  cast(a.osm_num as varchar(15))                      as fk_num_os
    ,a.osm_ctle_cnv                                                                         as nr_guia
    ,a.osm_serie
    ,a.osm_num
    ,a.osm_dthr                                                                             as dt_entrada
    ,a.osm_mreq                                                                             as cd_medico_sol
    ,a.osm_atend                                                                            as cd_tipo_atend
    ,a.osm_mcnv                                                                             as cd_carterinha_pac
    ,a.osm_w_senha                                                                          as senha_conv
    ,a.osm_cid_cod                                                                          as cd_cid
    ,a.osm_pln_cod                                                                          as cd_plano_convenio
    ,a.osm_leg_cod                                                                          as cd_estabelecimento
    ,a.osm_cnv                                                                              as cd_convenio
    ,a.osm_str                                                                              as cd_setor_atendimento
    ,itm.smm_str                                                                            as cd_setor_executante
    ,itm.smm_dthr_lanc                                                                      as dt_lanc_item
    -- ,itm.smm_dthr_exec                                                                      as dt_lanc_item
    ,itm.smm_med                                                                            as cd_medico_executante
    ,itm.smm_pre_ccv                                                                        as cd_item_conv
    ,smk.smk_cod                                                                            as cd_item_smart
    -- ,ISNULL(dp.cod_thm_1992,dp.cod_thm_1990)                                                as cd_amb
    ,smk.smk_amb                                                                             as cd_amb
    ,smk.smk_ctf
    ,smk.smk_tipo
    ,smk.smk_nome                                                                           as ds_item
    ,itm.smm_motivo_cancela                                                                 as motivo_cancel_item
    ,itm.smm_canc_mot_cod                                                                   as cod_motivo_cancel_item
    ,itm.smm_rpi_serie                                                                      as nr_serie_repasse
    ,itm.smm_rpi_num                                                                        as nr_repasse
    ,itm.smm_pacote                                                                         as ie_pacote
    ,itm.smm_fat_serie
    ,itm.smm_fat
    ,itm.smm_tipo_fatura
    ,itm.smm_sfat
    ,itm.smm_mns_serie
    ,itm.smm_mns_num                                                                      
    ,itm.smm_qt                                                                             as qtd
    ,itm.smm_vlr+ isnull(itm.smm_ajuste_vlr,0)                                              as vl_item
    ,itm.smm_num
    ,itm.smm_dthr_alter                                                                     as dt_atualizacao
FROM dbo.osm a                WITH  (NOLOCK)
-- left join dbo.hsp inter         (nolock) on inter.hsp_num = a.osm_hsp_num   
inner join dbo.pac pac        WITH  (NOLOCK) on pac.pac_reg = a.osm_pac
inner join dbo.smm itm        WITH  (NOLOCK) on itm.smm_osm = a.osm_num and itm.smm_osm_serie = a.osm_serie
inner join dbo.smk smk        WITH   (NOLOCK) on smk.smk_cod = itm.smm_cod and smk.smk_tipo = itm.smm_tpcod
-- left join dbo.cbhpm5_lpm dp     (NOLOCK) on dp.cod_cbhpm5 = itm.smm_pre_ccv
WHERE 
    --  a.osm_num = 107911
    --  a.osm_num in (109642,108325,61936,107911,90371)
    --    and a.osm_serie = 120
    --    and itm.smm_vlr <> 0
        (itm.smm_pacote IS NULL OR ( itm.smm_pacote = 'C' )) 
    -- and year(cast(itm.smm_dthr_lanc as date)) = 2019
       and itm.smm_canc_mot_cod is null 
       and itm.smm_sfat <> 'C' 
       and itm.smm_exec <> 'C'
       and itm.smm_str like '%'
       and smk.smk_ctf LIKE '%'
    
)

select 
    -- convert(varchar(10),a.dt_lancamento,111)
    91                                                                                       AS ID_SYS 
    ,CAST(CAST(a.osm_serie as varchar(10)) 
        + cast(a.osm_num as varchar(50)) 
        + CAST(a.smm_num AS VARCHAR(50))
        + CAST(a.cd_pessoa_fisica as varchar(50))
         AS DECIMAL)                                                                       as NR_SEQUENCIA
    ,a.cd_pessoa_fisica
    ,a.nr_atendimento
    ,a.nr_interno_conta
    ,a.fk_num_os
    ,a.cd_carterinha_pac
    ,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(a.nr_guia,'"','')))                                                as nr_guia
    ,a.cd_cid
    ,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(a.senha_conv,'"','')))                                             as senha_conv
    ,emp.emp_cgc                                                                            as cgc_convenio
    ,emp.emp_raz_soc                                                                        as nm_razao_social
    ,emp.emp_nome_fantasia                                                                  as nm_nome_fantasia
    ,a.cd_convenio                                                                          as cd_convenio  
    ,conv.cnv_nome                                                                          as ds_convenio
    ,a.dt_entrada
    ,G.gcc_cod                                                                              AS cd_estabelecimento
    ,G.gcc_descr                                                                            AS ds_estabelecimento
    ,str_fat.str_cod                                                                        as cd_estab_fat
    ,str_fat.str_nome                                                                       as ds_estab_fat
    ,str.str_nome                                                                           as ds_setor_atendimento
    ,str_exec.str_nome                                                                      as ds_setor_executante
    ,a.dt_lanc_item
    ,c.DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO                                                              as classif_item
    ,a.smm_num
    ,a.cd_amb
    ,a.cd_item_conv                                                                         as cd_item    
    ,replace(a.ds_item,',','')                                                              as ds_item
    ,a.qtd                                                                                  as qt_item
    ,a.vl_item                                                                              as vl_item
    ,fat.fat_dini                                                                           as dt_inicio_pre_fat
    ,cast(fat.fat_serie as varchar(10)) + '-' + cast(fat.fat_num as varchar(15))            as pre_fatura
    ,DS_TIPO_PFAT                                                                           as status_pre_fatura
    ,DS_STATUS_FAT                                                                          as status_faturamento
    ,nfs.nfs_numero                                                                         as nr_nfs
    ,nfs.nfs_tipo + cast(nfs.nfs_serie as varchar(50)) + cast(nfs.nfs_numero as varchar(50))               as fk_nfs
    ,nfs.nfs_dt_emis                                                                        as dt_emissao_nf
    ,nfs.nfs_dt_vcto                                                                        as dt_nf_vcto
    ,nfs.nfs_dt_envio                                                                       as dt_envio_nfs
    ,pac.pac_nome
from prod a
inner join dbo.str str           WITH   (NOLOCK)        on str.str_cod = a.cd_setor_atendimento
inner join dbo.str str_exec      WITH   (NOLOCK)        on str_exec.str_cod = a.cd_setor_executante
inner join dbo.gcc g             WITH   (NOLOCK)        on g.gcc_str_cod = str.str_str_cod
inner join dbo.cnv conv          WITH   (NOLOCK)        on conv.cnv_cod = a.cd_convenio
inner join dbo.emp               WITH   (nolock)        on emp_cod = conv.cnv_emp_cod  
inner join ctf   c                                      on ctf_cod = a.smk_ctf  and ctf_tipo = a.smk_tipo
left join dbo.fat fat            WITH   (NOLOCK)        on fat.fat_num = a.smm_fat and fat.fat_serie = a.smm_fat_serie and a.cd_convenio = fat.fat_cnv
left join aux_status_fat                                on CD_TIPO_FAT = a.smm_sfat
left join dbo.nfs nfs            WITH   (nolock)        on nfs.nfs_numero = fat.fat_nfs_numero and fat.fat_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo and nfs.nfs_serie = fat_nfs_serie
left join dbo.nfl nfl            WITH   (NOLOCK)        ON nfs.nfs_nfl_serie = nfl.nfl_serie and nfs.nfs_nfl_num = nfl.nfl_num
left join aux_pre_fat                                   on CD_TIPO_PFAT = fat.fat_stat
left join dbo.str str_fat        WITH   (nolock)        on str_fat.str_cod = nfl.nfl_str_emissor
-- left join dbo.gcc g_fat          WITH   (nolock)        on g_fat.gcc_str_cod = fat.fat_str_cod_sol
inner join dbo.pac  pac          WITH   (nolock)        on pac.pac_reg = a.cd_pessoa_fisica

where 
cast(a.dt_entrada as date) between '2015-01-01' and '2021-12-31'
-- and nfs.nfs_numero = 999908808
-- -- 999902524
-- 999905327
-- and a.fk_num_os = '119.140357'
and c.DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO is not null

with ctf as(

    SELECT
        x.ctf_cod    
        ,x.ctf_tipo
        ,case
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'C' then 'Consultas'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'R' then 'Cirurgias'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'E' then 'Exames'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'T' then 'Taxas'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'D' then 'Di√°rias'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'A' then 'Terapia'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'M' then 'Materiais'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'S' then 'Materiais Especiais'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'N' then 'Medicamentos'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'G' then 'Gases'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'O' then 'Outros'
          end DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO  
    from  dbo.ctf x WITH (NOLOCK)
)

,aux_pre_fat as(

    SELECT 'A' AS CD_TIPO_PFAT , 'ABERTO' AS DS_TIPO_PFAT
        UNION ALL
    SELECT 'P' AS CD_TIPO_PFAT , 'PROCESSADO' AS DS_TIPO_PFAT
        UNION ALL
    SELECT 'X' AS CD_TIPO_PFAT , 'EM PROCESSAMENTO' AS DS_TIPO_PFAT
        UNION ALL
    SELECT 'R' AS CD_TIPO_PFAT , 'PROCESSAMENTO INTERROPIDO POR ITENS SEM RATEIO' AS DS_TIPO_PFAT
        UNION ALL                        
    SELECT 'Z' AS CD_TIPO_PFAT , 'PRE-FATURA ZERADA' AS DS_TIPO_PFAT
                       
     
)

,aux_status_fat as(
    SELECT 'A' AS CD_TIPO_FAT, 'ABERTO' AS DS_STATUS_FAT
        UNION ALL
    SELECT 'P' AS CD_TIPO_FAT, 'PENDENTE' AS DS_STATUS_FAT
        UNION ALL
    SELECT 'F' AS CD_TIPO_FAT, 'FATURADO' AS DS_STATUS_FAT
        UNION ALL
    SELECT 'C' AS CD_TIPO_FAT, 'CANCELADO' AS DS_STATUS_FAT
    

)



,prod as(
SELECT
    pac.pac_nome
    ,a.osm_pac                                                                              as cd_pessoa_fisica
    ,cast(a.osm_num as varchar(15))                                                         as nr_atendimento
    ,cast(a.osm_serie as varchar(15))                                                       as nr_interno_conta
    ,cast(a.osm_serie as varchar(5)) +  cast(a.osm_num as varchar(15))                      as fk_num_os
    ,a.osm_ctle_cnv                                                                         as nr_guia
    ,a.osm_serie
    ,a.osm_num
    ,a.osm_dthr                                                                             as dt_entrada
    ,a.osm_mreq                                                                             as cd_medico_sol
    ,a.osm_atend                                                                            as cd_tipo_atend
    ,a.osm_mcnv                                                                             as cd_carterinha_pac
    ,a.osm_w_senha                                                                          as senha_conv
    ,a.osm_cid_cod                                                                          as cd_cid
    ,a.osm_pln_cod                                                                          as cd_plano_convenio
    ,a.osm_leg_cod                                                                          as cd_estabelecimento
    ,a.osm_cnv                                                                              as cd_convenio
    ,a.osm_str                                                                              as cd_setor_atendimento
    ,itm.smm_str                                                                            as cd_setor_executante
    ,itm.smm_dthr_lanc                                                                      as dt_lanc_item
    -- ,itm.smm_dthr_exec                                                                      as dt_lanc_item
    ,itm.smm_med                                                                            as cd_medico_executante
    ,itm.smm_pre_ccv                                                                        as cd_item_conv
    ,smk.smk_cod                                                                            as cd_item_smart
    -- ,ISNULL(dp.cod_thm_1992,dp.cod_thm_1990)                                                as cd_amb
    ,smk.smk_amb                                                                             as cd_amb
    ,smk.smk_ctf
    ,smk.smk_tipo
    ,smk.smk_nome                                                                           as ds_item
    ,itm.smm_motivo_cancela                                                                 as motivo_cancel_item
    ,itm.smm_canc_mot_cod                                                                   as cod_motivo_cancel_item
    ,itm.smm_rpi_serie                                                                      as nr_serie_repasse
    ,itm.smm_rpi_num                                                                        as nr_repasse
    ,itm.smm_pacote                                                                         as ie_pacote
    ,itm.smm_fat_serie
    ,itm.smm_fat
    ,itm.smm_tipo_fatura
    ,itm.smm_sfat
    ,itm.smm_mns_serie
    ,itm.smm_mns_num                                                                      
    ,itm.smm_qt                                                                             as qtd
    ,itm.smm_vlr+ isnull(itm.smm_ajuste_vlr,0)                                              as vl_item
    ,itm.smm_num
    ,itm.smm_dthr_alter                                                                     as dt_atualizacao
FROM dbo.osm a                WITH  (NOLOCK)
-- left join dbo.hsp inter         (nolock) on inter.hsp_num = a.osm_hsp_num   
inner join dbo.pac pac        WITH  (NOLOCK) on pac.pac_reg = a.osm_pac
inner join dbo.smm itm        WITH  (NOLOCK) on itm.smm_osm = a.osm_num and itm.smm_osm_serie = a.osm_serie
inner join dbo.smk smk        WITH   (NOLOCK) on smk.smk_cod = itm.smm_cod and smk.smk_tipo = itm.smm_tpcod
-- left join dbo.cbhpm5_lpm dp     (NOLOCK) on dp.cod_cbhpm5 = itm.smm_pre_ccv
WHERE 
    --  a.osm_num = 107911
    --  a.osm_num in (109642,108325,61936,107911,90371)
    --    and a.osm_serie = 120
    --    and itm.smm_vlr <> 0
        (itm.smm_pacote IS NULL OR ( itm.smm_pacote = 'C' )) 
    -- and year(cast(itm.smm_dthr_lanc as date)) = 2019
       and itm.smm_canc_mot_cod is null 
       and itm.smm_sfat <> 'C' 
       and itm.smm_exec <> 'C'
       and itm.smm_str like '%'
       and smk.smk_ctf LIKE '%'
    
)

select 
    -- convert(varchar(10),a.dt_lancamento,111)
    92                                                                                       AS ID_SYS 
    ,CAST(CAST(a.osm_serie as varchar(10)) 
        + cast(a.osm_num as varchar(50)) 
        + CAST(a.smm_num AS VARCHAR(50))
        + CAST(a.cd_pessoa_fisica as varchar(50))
         AS DECIMAL)                                                                       as NR_SEQUENCIA
    ,a.cd_pessoa_fisica
    ,a.nr_atendimento
    ,a.nr_interno_conta
    ,a.fk_num_os
    ,a.cd_carterinha_pac
    ,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(a.nr_guia,'"','')))                                                as nr_guia
    ,a.cd_cid
    ,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(a.senha_conv,'"','')))                                             as senha_conv
    ,emp.emp_cgc                                                                            as cgc_convenio
    ,emp.emp_raz_soc                                                                        as nm_razao_social
    ,emp.emp_nome_fantasia                                                                  as nm_nome_fantasia
    ,a.cd_convenio                                                                          as cd_convenio  
    ,conv.cnv_nome                                                                          as ds_convenio
    ,a.dt_entrada
    ,G.gcc_cod                                                                              AS cd_estabelecimento
    ,G.gcc_descr                                                                            AS ds_estabelecimento
    ,str_fat.str_cod                                                                        as cd_estab_fat
    ,str_fat.str_nome                                                                       as ds_estab_fat
    ,str.str_nome                                                                           as ds_setor_atendimento
    ,str_exec.str_nome                                                                      as ds_setor_executante
    ,a.dt_lanc_item
    ,c.DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO                                                              as classif_item
    ,a.smm_num
    ,a.cd_amb
    ,a.cd_item_conv                                                                         as cd_item    
    ,replace(a.ds_item,',','')                                                              as ds_item
    ,a.qtd                                                                                  as qt_item
    ,a.vl_item                                                                              as vl_item
    ,fat.fat_dini                                                                           as dt_inicio_pre_fat
    ,cast(fat.fat_serie as varchar(10)) + '-' + cast(fat.fat_num as varchar(15))            as pre_fatura
    ,DS_TIPO_PFAT                                                                           as status_pre_fatura
    ,DS_STATUS_FAT                                                                          as status_faturamento
    ,nfs.nfs_numero                                                                         as nr_nfs
    ,nfs.nfs_tipo + cast(nfs.nfs_serie as varchar(50)) + cast(nfs.nfs_numero as varchar(50))               as fk_nfs
    ,nfs.nfs_dt_emis                                                                        as dt_emissao_nf
    ,nfs.nfs_dt_vcto                                                                        as dt_nf_vcto
    ,nfs.nfs_dt_envio                                                                       as dt_envio_nfs
    ,pac.pac_nome
from prod a
inner join dbo.str str           WITH   (NOLOCK)        on str.str_cod = a.cd_setor_atendimento
inner join dbo.str str_exec      WITH   (NOLOCK)        on str_exec.str_cod = a.cd_setor_executante
inner join dbo.gcc g             WITH   (NOLOCK)        on g.gcc_str_cod = str.str_str_cod
inner join dbo.cnv conv          WITH   (NOLOCK)        on conv.cnv_cod = a.cd_convenio
inner join dbo.emp               WITH   (nolock)        on emp_cod = conv.cnv_emp_cod  
inner join ctf   c                                      on ctf_cod = a.smk_ctf  and ctf_tipo = a.smk_tipo
left join dbo.fat fat            WITH   (NOLOCK)        on fat.fat_num = a.smm_fat and fat.fat_serie = a.smm_fat_serie and a.cd_convenio = fat.fat_cnv
left join aux_status_fat                                on CD_TIPO_FAT = a.smm_sfat
left join dbo.nfs nfs            WITH   (nolock)        on nfs.nfs_numero = fat.fat_nfs_numero and fat.fat_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo and nfs.nfs_serie = fat_nfs_serie
left join dbo.nfl nfl            WITH   (NOLOCK)        ON nfs.nfs_nfl_serie = nfl.nfl_serie and nfs.nfs_nfl_num = nfl.nfl_num
left join aux_pre_fat                                   on CD_TIPO_PFAT = fat.fat_stat
left join dbo.str str_fat        WITH   (nolock)        on str_fat.str_cod = nfl.nfl_str_emissor
-- left join dbo.gcc g_fat          WITH   (nolock)        on g_fat.gcc_str_cod = fat.fat_str_cod_sol
inner join dbo.pac  pac          WITH   (nolock)        on pac.pac_reg = a.cd_pessoa_fisica

where 
cast(a.dt_entrada as date) between '2015-01-01' and '2021-12-31'
-- and nfs.nfs_numero = 999908808
-- -- 999902524
-- 999905327
-- and a.fk_num_os = '119.140357'
and c.DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO is not null

with ctf as(

    SELECT
        x.ctf_cod    
        ,x.ctf_tipo
        ,case
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'C' then 'Consultas'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'R' then 'Cirurgias'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'E' then 'Exames'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'T' then 'Taxas'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'D' then 'Di√°rias'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'A' then 'Terapia'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'M' then 'Materiais'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'S' then 'Materiais Especiais'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'N' then 'Medicamentos'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'G' then 'Gases'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'O' then 'Outros'
          end DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO  
    from  dbo.ctf x WITH (NOLOCK)
)

,aux_pre_fat as(

    SELECT 'A' AS CD_TIPO_PFAT , 'ABERTO' AS DS_TIPO_PFAT
        UNION ALL
    SELECT 'P' AS CD_TIPO_PFAT , 'PROCESSADO' AS DS_TIPO_PFAT
        UNION ALL
    SELECT 'X' AS CD_TIPO_PFAT , 'EM PROCESSAMENTO' AS DS_TIPO_PFAT
        UNION ALL
    SELECT 'R' AS CD_TIPO_PFAT , 'PROCESSAMENTO INTERROPIDO POR ITENS SEM RATEIO' AS DS_TIPO_PFAT
        UNION ALL                        
    SELECT 'Z' AS CD_TIPO_PFAT , 'PRE-FATURA ZERADA' AS DS_TIPO_PFAT
                       
     
)

,aux_status_fat as(
    SELECT 'A' AS CD_TIPO_FAT, 'ABERTO' AS DS_STATUS_FAT
        UNION ALL
    SELECT 'P' AS CD_TIPO_FAT, 'PENDENTE' AS DS_STATUS_FAT
        UNION ALL
    SELECT 'F' AS CD_TIPO_FAT, 'FATURADO' AS DS_STATUS_FAT
        UNION ALL
    SELECT 'C' AS CD_TIPO_FAT, 'CANCELADO' AS DS_STATUS_FAT
    

)



,prod as(
SELECT
    pac.pac_nome
    ,a.osm_pac                                                                              as cd_pessoa_fisica
    ,cast(a.osm_num as varchar(15))                                                         as nr_atendimento
    ,cast(a.osm_serie as varchar(15))                                                       as nr_interno_conta
    ,cast(a.osm_serie as varchar(5)) +  cast(a.osm_num as varchar(15))                      as fk_num_os
    ,a.osm_ctle_cnv                                                                         as nr_guia
    ,a.osm_serie
    ,a.osm_num
    ,a.osm_dthr                                                                             as dt_entrada
    ,a.osm_mreq                                                                             as cd_medico_sol
    ,a.osm_atend                                                                            as cd_tipo_atend
    ,a.osm_mcnv                                                                             as cd_carterinha_pac
    ,a.osm_w_senha                                                                          as senha_conv
    ,a.osm_cid_cod                                                                          as cd_cid
    ,a.osm_pln_cod                                                                          as cd_plano_convenio
    ,a.osm_leg_cod                                                                          as cd_estabelecimento
    ,a.osm_cnv                                                                              as cd_convenio
    ,a.osm_str                                                                              as cd_setor_atendimento
    ,itm.smm_str                                                                            as cd_setor_executante
    ,itm.smm_dthr_lanc                                                                      as dt_lanc_item
    -- ,itm.smm_dthr_exec                                                                      as dt_lanc_item
    ,itm.smm_med                                                                            as cd_medico_executante
    ,itm.smm_pre_ccv                                                                        as cd_item_conv
    ,smk.smk_cod                                                                            as cd_item_smart
    -- ,ISNULL(dp.cod_thm_1992,dp.cod_thm_1990)                                                as cd_amb
    ,smk.smk_amb                                                                             as cd_amb
    ,smk.smk_ctf
    ,smk.smk_tipo
    ,smk.smk_nome                                                                           as ds_item
    ,itm.smm_motivo_cancela                                                                 as motivo_cancel_item
    ,itm.smm_canc_mot_cod                                                                   as cod_motivo_cancel_item
    ,itm.smm_rpi_serie                                                                      as nr_serie_repasse
    ,itm.smm_rpi_num                                                                        as nr_repasse
    ,itm.smm_pacote                                                                         as ie_pacote
    ,itm.smm_fat_serie
    ,itm.smm_fat
    ,itm.smm_tipo_fatura
    ,itm.smm_sfat
    ,itm.smm_mns_serie
    ,itm.smm_mns_num                                                                      
    ,itm.smm_qt                                                                             as qtd
    ,itm.smm_vlr+ isnull(itm.smm_ajuste_vlr,0)                                              as vl_item
    ,itm.smm_num
    ,itm.smm_dthr_alter                                                                     as dt_atualizacao
FROM dbo.osm a                WITH  (NOLOCK)
-- left join dbo.hsp inter         (nolock) on inter.hsp_num = a.osm_hsp_num   
inner join dbo.pac pac        WITH  (NOLOCK) on pac.pac_reg = a.osm_pac
inner join dbo.smm itm        WITH  (NOLOCK) on itm.smm_osm = a.osm_num and itm.smm_osm_serie = a.osm_serie
inner join dbo.smk smk        WITH   (NOLOCK) on smk.smk_cod = itm.smm_cod and smk.smk_tipo = itm.smm_tpcod
-- left join dbo.cbhpm5_lpm dp     (NOLOCK) on dp.cod_cbhpm5 = itm.smm_pre_ccv
WHERE 
    --  a.osm_num = 107911
    --  a.osm_num in (109642,108325,61936,107911,90371)
    --    and a.osm_serie = 120
    --    and itm.smm_vlr <> 0
        (itm.smm_pacote IS NULL OR ( itm.smm_pacote = 'C' )) 
    -- and year(cast(itm.smm_dthr_lanc as date)) = 2019
       and itm.smm_canc_mot_cod is null 
       and itm.smm_sfat <> 'C' 
       and itm.smm_exec <> 'C'
       and itm.smm_str like '%'
       and smk.smk_ctf LIKE '%'
    
)

select 
    -- convert(varchar(10),a.dt_lancamento,111)
    93                                                                                       AS ID_SYS 
    ,CAST(CAST(a.osm_serie as varchar(10)) 
        + cast(a.osm_num as varchar(50)) 
        + CAST(a.smm_num AS VARCHAR(50))
        + CAST(a.cd_pessoa_fisica as varchar(50))
         AS DECIMAL)                                                                       as NR_SEQUENCIA
    ,a.cd_pessoa_fisica
    ,a.nr_atendimento
    ,a.nr_interno_conta
    ,a.fk_num_os
    ,a.cd_carterinha_pac
    ,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(a.nr_guia,'"','')))                                                as nr_guia
    ,a.cd_cid
    ,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(a.senha_conv,'"','')))                                             as senha_conv
    ,emp.emp_cgc                                                                            as cgc_convenio
    ,emp.emp_raz_soc                                                                        as nm_razao_social
    ,emp.emp_nome_fantasia                                                                  as nm_nome_fantasia
    ,a.cd_convenio                                                                          as cd_convenio  
    ,conv.cnv_nome                                                                          as ds_convenio
    ,a.dt_entrada
    ,G.gcc_cod                                                                              AS cd_estabelecimento
    ,G.gcc_descr                                                                            AS ds_estabelecimento
    ,str_fat.str_cod                                                                        as cd_estab_fat
    ,str_fat.str_nome                                                                       as ds_estab_fat
    ,str.str_nome                                                                           as ds_setor_atendimento
    ,str_exec.str_nome                                                                      as ds_setor_executante
    ,a.dt_lanc_item
    ,c.DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO                                                              as classif_item
    ,a.smm_num
    ,a.cd_amb
    ,a.cd_item_conv                                                                         as cd_item    
    ,replace(a.ds_item,',','')                                                              as ds_item
    ,a.qtd                                                                                  as qt_item
    ,a.vl_item                                                                              as vl_item
    ,fat.fat_dini                                                                           as dt_inicio_pre_fat
    ,cast(fat.fat_serie as varchar(10)) + '-' + cast(fat.fat_num as varchar(15))            as pre_fatura
    ,DS_TIPO_PFAT                                                                           as status_pre_fatura
    ,DS_STATUS_FAT                                                                          as status_faturamento
    ,nfs.nfs_numero                                                                         as nr_nfs
    ,nfs.nfs_tipo + cast(nfs.nfs_serie as varchar(50)) + cast(nfs.nfs_numero as varchar(50))               as fk_nfs
    ,nfs.nfs_dt_emis                                                                        as dt_emissao_nf
    ,nfs.nfs_dt_vcto                                                                        as dt_nf_vcto
    ,nfs.nfs_dt_envio                                                                       as dt_envio_nfs
    ,pac.pac_nome
from prod a
inner join dbo.str str           WITH   (NOLOCK)        on str.str_cod = a.cd_setor_atendimento
inner join dbo.str str_exec      WITH   (NOLOCK)        on str_exec.str_cod = a.cd_setor_executante
inner join dbo.gcc g             WITH   (NOLOCK)        on g.gcc_str_cod = str.str_str_cod
inner join dbo.cnv conv          WITH   (NOLOCK)        on conv.cnv_cod = a.cd_convenio
inner join dbo.emp               WITH   (nolock)        on emp_cod = conv.cnv_emp_cod  
inner join ctf   c                                      on ctf_cod = a.smk_ctf  and ctf_tipo = a.smk_tipo
left join dbo.fat fat            WITH   (NOLOCK)        on fat.fat_num = a.smm_fat and fat.fat_serie = a.smm_fat_serie and a.cd_convenio = fat.fat_cnv
left join aux_status_fat                                on CD_TIPO_FAT = a.smm_sfat
left join dbo.nfs nfs            WITH   (nolock)        on nfs.nfs_numero = fat.fat_nfs_numero and fat.fat_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo and nfs.nfs_serie = fat_nfs_serie
left join dbo.nfl nfl            WITH   (NOLOCK)        ON nfs.nfs_nfl_serie = nfl.nfl_serie and nfs.nfs_nfl_num = nfl.nfl_num
left join aux_pre_fat                                   on CD_TIPO_PFAT = fat.fat_stat
left join dbo.str str_fat        WITH   (nolock)        on str_fat.str_cod = nfl.nfl_str_emissor
-- left join dbo.gcc g_fat          WITH   (nolock)        on g_fat.gcc_str_cod = fat.fat_str_cod_sol
inner join dbo.pac  pac          WITH   (nolock)        on pac.pac_reg = a.cd_pessoa_fisica

where 
cast(a.dt_entrada as date) between '2015-01-01' and '2021-12-31'
-- and nfs.nfs_numero = 999908808
-- -- 999902524
-- 999905327
-- and a.fk_num_os = '119.140357'
and c.DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO is not null

with ctf as(

    SELECT
        x.ctf_cod    
        ,x.ctf_tipo
        ,case
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'C' then 'Consultas'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'R' then 'Cirurgias'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'E' then 'Exames'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'T' then 'Taxas'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'D' then 'Di√°rias'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'A' then 'Terapia'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'M' then 'Materiais'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'S' then 'Materiais Especiais'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'N' then 'Medicamentos'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'G' then 'Gases'
            when UPPER(x.ctf_categ) = 'O' then 'Outros'
          end DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO  
    from  dbo.ctf x WITH (NOLOCK)
)

,aux_pre_fat as(

    SELECT 'A' AS CD_TIPO_PFAT , 'ABERTO' AS DS_TIPO_PFAT
        UNION ALL
    SELECT 'P' AS CD_TIPO_PFAT , 'PROCESSADO' AS DS_TIPO_PFAT
        UNION ALL
    SELECT 'X' AS CD_TIPO_PFAT , 'EM PROCESSAMENTO' AS DS_TIPO_PFAT
        UNION ALL
    SELECT 'R' AS CD_TIPO_PFAT , 'PROCESSAMENTO INTERROPIDO POR ITENS SEM RATEIO' AS DS_TIPO_PFAT
        UNION ALL                        
    SELECT 'Z' AS CD_TIPO_PFAT , 'PRE-FATURA ZERADA' AS DS_TIPO_PFAT
                       
     
)

,aux_status_fat as(
    SELECT 'A' AS CD_TIPO_FAT, 'ABERTO' AS DS_STATUS_FAT
        UNION ALL
    SELECT 'P' AS CD_TIPO_FAT, 'PENDENTE' AS DS_STATUS_FAT
        UNION ALL
    SELECT 'F' AS CD_TIPO_FAT, 'FATURADO' AS DS_STATUS_FAT
        UNION ALL
    SELECT 'C' AS CD_TIPO_FAT, 'CANCELADO' AS DS_STATUS_FAT
    

)



,prod as(
SELECT
    pac.pac_nome
    ,a.osm_pac                                                                              as cd_pessoa_fisica
    ,cast(a.osm_num as varchar(15))                                                         as nr_atendimento
    ,cast(a.osm_serie as varchar(15))                                                       as nr_interno_conta
    ,cast(a.osm_serie as varchar(5)) +  cast(a.osm_num as varchar(15))                      as fk_num_os
    ,a.osm_ctle_cnv                                                                         as nr_guia
    ,a.osm_serie
    ,a.osm_num
    ,a.osm_dthr                                                                             as dt_entrada
    ,a.osm_mreq                                                                             as cd_medico_sol
    ,a.osm_atend                                                                            as cd_tipo_atend
    ,a.osm_mcnv                                                                             as cd_carterinha_pac
    ,a.osm_w_senha                                                                          as senha_conv
    ,a.osm_cid_cod                                                                          as cd_cid
    ,a.osm_pln_cod                                                                          as cd_plano_convenio
    ,a.osm_leg_cod                                                                          as cd_estabelecimento
    ,a.osm_cnv                                                                              as cd_convenio
    ,a.osm_str                                                                              as cd_setor_atendimento
    ,itm.smm_str                                                                            as cd_setor_executante
    ,itm.smm_dthr_lanc                                                                      as dt_lanc_item
    -- ,itm.smm_dthr_exec                                                                      as dt_lanc_item
    ,itm.smm_med                                                                            as cd_medico_executante
    ,itm.smm_pre_ccv                                                                        as cd_item_conv
    ,smk.smk_cod                                                                            as cd_item_smart
    -- ,ISNULL(dp.cod_thm_1992,dp.cod_thm_1990)                                                as cd_amb
    ,smk.smk_amb                                                                             as cd_amb
    ,smk.smk_ctf
    ,smk.smk_tipo
    ,smk.smk_nome                                                                           as ds_item
    ,itm.smm_motivo_cancela                                                                 as motivo_cancel_item
    ,itm.smm_canc_mot_cod                                                                   as cod_motivo_cancel_item
    ,itm.smm_rpi_serie                                                                      as nr_serie_repasse
    ,itm.smm_rpi_num                                                                        as nr_repasse
    ,itm.smm_pacote                                                                         as ie_pacote
    ,itm.smm_fat_serie
    ,itm.smm_fat
    ,itm.smm_tipo_fatura
    ,itm.smm_sfat
    ,itm.smm_mns_serie
    ,itm.smm_mns_num                                                                      
    ,itm.smm_qt                                                                             as qtd
    ,itm.smm_vlr+ isnull(itm.smm_ajuste_vlr,0)                                              as vl_item
    ,itm.smm_num
    ,itm.smm_dthr_alter                                                                     as dt_atualizacao
FROM dbo.osm a                WITH  (NOLOCK)
-- left join dbo.hsp inter         (nolock) on inter.hsp_num = a.osm_hsp_num   
inner join dbo.pac pac        WITH  (NOLOCK) on pac.pac_reg = a.osm_pac
inner join dbo.smm itm        WITH  (NOLOCK) on itm.smm_osm = a.osm_num and itm.smm_osm_serie = a.osm_serie
inner join dbo.smk smk        WITH   (NOLOCK) on smk.smk_cod = itm.smm_cod and smk.smk_tipo = itm.smm_tpcod
-- left join dbo.cbhpm5_lpm dp     (NOLOCK) on dp.cod_cbhpm5 = itm.smm_pre_ccv
WHERE 
    --  a.osm_num = 107911
    --  a.osm_num in (109642,108325,61936,107911,90371)
    --    and a.osm_serie = 120
    --    and itm.smm_vlr <> 0
        (itm.smm_pacote IS NULL OR ( itm.smm_pacote = 'C' )) 
    -- and year(cast(itm.smm_dthr_lanc as date)) = 2019
       and itm.smm_canc_mot_cod is null 
       and itm.smm_sfat <> 'C' 
       and itm.smm_exec <> 'C'
       and itm.smm_str like '%'
       and smk.smk_ctf LIKE '%'
    
)

select 
    -- convert(varchar(10),a.dt_lancamento,111)
    90                                                                                       AS ID_SYS 
    ,CAST(CAST(a.osm_serie as varchar(10)) 
        + cast(a.osm_num as varchar(50)) 
        + CAST(a.smm_num AS VARCHAR(50))
        + CAST(a.cd_pessoa_fisica as varchar(50))
         AS DECIMAL)                                                                       as NR_SEQUENCIA
    ,a.cd_pessoa_fisica
    ,a.nr_atendimento
    ,a.nr_interno_conta
    ,a.fk_num_os
    ,a.cd_carterinha_pac
    ,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(a.nr_guia,'"','')))                                                as nr_guia
    ,a.cd_cid
    ,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(a.senha_conv,'"','')))                                             as senha_conv
    ,emp.emp_cgc                                                                            as cgc_convenio
    ,emp.emp_raz_soc                                                                        as nm_razao_social
    ,emp.emp_nome_fantasia                                                                  as nm_nome_fantasia
    ,a.cd_convenio                                                                          as cd_convenio  
    ,conv.cnv_nome                                                                          as ds_convenio
    ,a.dt_entrada
    ,G.gcc_cod                                                                              AS cd_estabelecimento
    ,G.gcc_descr                                                                            AS ds_estabelecimento
    ,str_fat.str_cod                                                                        as cd_estab_fat
    ,str_fat.str_nome                                                                       as ds_estab_fat
    ,str.str_nome                                                                           as ds_setor_atendimento
    ,str_exec.str_nome                                                                      as ds_setor_executante
    ,a.dt_lanc_item
    ,c.DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO                                                              as classif_item
    ,a.smm_num
    ,a.cd_amb
    ,a.cd_item_conv                                                                         as cd_item    
    ,replace(a.ds_item,',','')                                                              as ds_item
    ,a.qtd                                                                                  as qt_item
    ,a.vl_item                                                                              as vl_item
    ,fat.fat_dini                                                                           as dt_inicio_pre_fat
    ,cast(fat.fat_serie as varchar(10)) + '-' + cast(fat.fat_num as varchar(15))            as pre_fatura
    ,DS_TIPO_PFAT                                                                           as status_pre_fatura
    ,DS_STATUS_FAT                                                                          as status_faturamento
    ,nfs.nfs_numero                                                                         as nr_nfs
    ,nfs.nfs_tipo + cast(nfs.nfs_serie as varchar(50)) + cast(nfs.nfs_numero as varchar(50))               as fk_nfs
    ,nfs.nfs_dt_emis                                                                        as dt_emissao_nf
    ,nfs.nfs_dt_vcto                                                                        as dt_nf_vcto
    ,nfs.nfs_dt_envio                                                                       as dt_envio_nfs
    ,pac.pac_nome
from prod a
inner join dbo.str str           WITH   (NOLOCK)        on str.str_cod = a.cd_setor_atendimento
inner join dbo.str str_exec      WITH   (NOLOCK)        on str_exec.str_cod = a.cd_setor_executante
inner join dbo.gcc g             WITH   (NOLOCK)        on g.gcc_str_cod = str.str_str_cod
inner join dbo.cnv conv          WITH   (NOLOCK)        on conv.cnv_cod = a.cd_convenio
inner join dbo.emp               WITH   (nolock)        on emp_cod = conv.cnv_emp_cod  
inner join ctf   c                                      on ctf_cod = a.smk_ctf  and ctf_tipo = a.smk_tipo
left join dbo.fat fat            WITH   (NOLOCK)        on fat.fat_num = a.smm_fat and fat.fat_serie = a.smm_fat_serie and a.cd_convenio = fat.fat_cnv
left join aux_status_fat                                on CD_TIPO_FAT = a.smm_sfat
left join dbo.nfs nfs            WITH   (nolock)        on nfs.nfs_numero = fat.fat_nfs_numero and fat.fat_nfs_tipo = nfs.nfs_tipo and nfs.nfs_serie = fat_nfs_serie
left join dbo.nfl nfl            WITH   (NOLOCK)        ON nfs.nfs_nfl_serie = nfl.nfl_serie and nfs.nfs_nfl_num = nfl.nfl_num
left join aux_pre_fat                                   on CD_TIPO_PFAT = fat.fat_stat
left join dbo.str str_fat        WITH   (nolock)        on str_fat.str_cod = nfl.nfl_str_emissor
-- left join dbo.gcc g_fat          WITH   (nolock)        on g_fat.gcc_str_cod = fat.fat_str_cod_sol
inner join dbo.pac  pac          WITH   (nolock)        on pac.pac_reg = a.cd_pessoa_fisica

where 
cast(a.dt_entrada as date) between '2015-01-01' and '2021-12-31'
-- and nfs.nfs_numero = 999908808
-- -- 999902524
-- 999905327
-- and a.fk_num_os = '119.140357'
and c.DS_CLASSIF_PROCEDIMENTO is not null
